title: Mark Ryan
author: Mark Ryan
content: Hey guys. I accidentally saw a new online shop, the shop owner is a miner manufacturer from China, has anyone heard of this? https://shop.canaan.io/

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Nothing new about it, canaan.io is legit, one of the oldest manufacturers of gear.Just be careful to use their website and not something with extra aaaa in the domain name or other funny extensions.

comments.author: nullama
comments.body: It's been discussed in this forum before.Here's one of those threads: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3169292.0

comments.author: Mark Ryan
comments.body: Thanks for reminding, it should be the official shop, i contacted their customer service team by Live chat. It's shop.canaan.ioQuote from: stompix on May 16, 2022, 06:48:58 AMNothing new about it, canaan.io is legit, one of the oldest manufacturers of gear.Just be careful to use their website and not something with extra aaaa in the domain name or other funny extensions.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Canaan.io is one of the legit ASIC machine manufacturers since 2016 currently they don't have an official distributor of their miners.If you are looking for more ASIC miner manufacturers I suggest you check this link below.- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5045732.0All of them are direct manufacturers if you buy units from them.

comments.author: Mark Ryan
comments.body: The new shop is just opening, only a few ppl know maybe~

comments.author: NotFuzzyWarm
comments.created_time: May 17, 2022, 12:23:25 PMLast edit: May 17, 2022, 02:35:29 PM by NotFuzzyWarm
comments.body: Quote from: Mark Ryan on May 17, 2022, 10:52:12 AMThe new shop is just opening, only a few ppl know maybe~Again, Canaan is NOT new.They produced the 1st ASIC chip back in late 2012 and released the 1st ASIC-based miner in 2013 QuoteThe Avalon chip was the first application-specific integrated circuit (ASIC) designed for bitcoin mining to hit the market, or the process by which new transaction blocks are created on the bitcoin network. Canaan Creative was founded in 2012, releasing its first Avalon chip the following year source hereIMHO Canaan generally produces the best miners. While their Avalon miners may not be quite as efficient as Bitmain's Ants are, the Avalons' are far far more reliable.

comments.author: statham117
comments.body: Quote from: Mark Ryan on May 16, 2022, 06:30:39 AM Hey guys. I accidentally saw a new online shop, the shop owner is a miner manufacturer from China, has anyone heard of this? https://shop.canaan.io/Their Avalon miner is a very reliable machine. If you need it, you can contact me and I can provide you with the latest and best prices.www.miner-machines.com

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: Mark Ryan on May 16, 2022, 06:30:39 AM Hey guys. I accidentally saw a new online shop, the shop owner is a miner manufacturer from China, has anyone heard of this? https://shop.canaan.io/Explore the list of suppliers in the section Where to buy if you are interested in canaan models.https://www.asicminervalue.com/miners/canaan/avalonminer-1246Use this site to know the average price in the market and then you will not be deceived.

comments.author: NotFuzzyWarm
comments.body: Folks, I hope you have paid attention to Canaan's Terms page, specifically the part about Warranty repairs:Quote2. The warranty only applies to the original purchaser who purchased the machine directly from CANAAN. Once the miner is resold, the warranty coverage becomes the responsibility of the re-seller rather than CANAAN.Because Canaan no longer uses Authorized Distributors that applies to ALL companies that are acting as resellers or unofficial distributors of their mining equipment.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: NotFuzzyWarm on May 21, 2022, 07:51:32 PMFolks, I hope you have paid attention to Canaan's Terms page, specifically the part about Warranty repairs:Quote2. The warranty only applies to the original purchaser who purchased the machine directly from CANAAN. Once the miner is resold, the warranty coverage becomes the responsibility of the re-seller rather than CANAAN.Because Canaan no longer uses Authorized Distributors that applies to ALL companies that are acting as resellers or unofficial distributors of their mining equipment. CANAAN will never know how many times an ASIC has been resold. You must send the ASIC to the first buyer, and he will send it to China for warranty service. This can take several months, so miners first look for good services that can quickly repair ASICs in their country.

comments.author: MARK21
comments.body: Canaan has been on the market since 2013, in fact a post about it has already been made: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3169292.0

comments.author: Mikky.Crypto
comments.body: First time I hear about it. It would be interesting to know more about this to begin with.

comments.author: NotFuzzyWarm
comments.created_time: May 25, 2022, 05:30:30 PMLast edit: May 25, 2022, 07:58:42 PM by NotFuzzyWarm
comments.body: Quote from: Mikky.Crypto on May 25, 2022, 10:24:53 AMFirst time I hear about it. It would be interesting to know more about this to begin with.Someone been living under a rock? Many existing threads about their different miners in the Hardware area, just use 'Avalon' or 'Canaan' as a search term. Various models were the A6, A721, A741, A821, A841, A941 (their only clunker but the 1st 10nm miner to market beating Bitmain by 3 months). Starting with the A10xx they followed MicroBt & Bitmain and changed to using built-in PSU to raise efficiency. For a very long time their Avalon 841 has been the most durable miner ever made.

comments.author: THANOSMINING
comments.body: Please be careful with this website, he may be a scam, it is recommended to contact Avalon's official Chinese website, and then contact websites outside of China through them.

comments.author: Mark Ryan
comments.body: Quote from: THANOSMINING on May 29, 2022, 01:39:35 AMPlease be careful with this website, he may be a scam, it is recommended to contact Avalon's official Chinese website, and then contact websites outside of China through them.It's their official online shop, i have checked on their official website.You can find the shopping cart. I guess they just started this new program.

comments.author: MrDave
comments.body: Quote from: Mark Ryan on May 29, 2022, 04:36:23 AMQuote from: THANOSMINING on May 29, 2022, 01:39:35 AMPlease be careful with this website, he may be a scam, it is recommended to contact Avalon's official Chinese website, and then contact websites outside of China through them.It's their official online shop, i have checked on their official website.You can find the shopping cart. I guess they just started this new program.You seem a marketer to me after reading this thread. must be promoting the same thing

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: MrDave on June 03, 2022, 07:15:04 AMYou seem a marketer to me after reading this thread. must be promoting the same thingHe might be an alt account of this dongqudalaoli who promoting Canaan's official website that includes a fake telegram link. Canaan never use telegram to contact their customers. So there is a big possibility that this man is one person trying to promote something or the telegram link. I believe sooner or later if this thread is already buried in a few pages in this section he will edit his post and add the telegram link just like other users who try to manipulate the forum(Blackhat strategy).

comments.author: Mark Ryan
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on June 03, 2022, 11:57:49 PMQuote from: MrDave on June 03, 2022, 07:15:04 AMYou seem a marketer to me after reading this thread. must be promoting the same thingHe might be an alt account of this dongqudalaoli who promoting Canaan's official website that includes a fake telegram link. Canaan never use telegram to contact their customers. So there is a big possibility that this man is one person trying to promote something or the telegram link. I believe sooner or later if this thread is already buried in a few pages in this section he will edit his post and add the telegram link just like other users who try to manipulate the forum(Blackhat strategy).Canaan did start its official Telegram group, i am already in their group.

comments.body: first time to hear,interested to knew something more about it.i thinkThis is the one of the best machines of mining
